post:
Well as you may or may not no we have been working hard to launch our new premium KVM line and sister company over the last 4 or 5 month's after several testing periods and delays with hardware we are now officially online and taking orders.

We are offering our good old friend's at LEB the chance to swipe just 10 of these configs before we advertise elsewhere, this is strictly a LowEndTalk members only promotion.

**KVM Tiny** | **Just £4.42/month ($7*)**
12GB HDD Space (Based on a 4X 15K RAID10 disk setup)
256MB Dedicated RAM (DDR3/ECC)
256MB HDD Swap Space
500GB Data Transfer (On a 1000Mbit connection)
1 Xeon "E3-1230" CPU Core @ 3.20GHz with HT
1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
SolusVM Control Panel
100% Non oversold resources

http://kvmport.com/packages.htm
Please use promotion code C5BZDN8K to get the discounted price.

Servers are located in the NJ3 Equinx facility in New Jersey (USA) backed by upstream providers such as Level3, NLayer, Global Crossing and NTT. You can use the following IP for ping/traceroute results 108.60.137.162.

We are working towards getting IPv6 up and running within the next month and four free addresses will be included with all packages!

You can find more information at our new website! www.kvmport.com

*Approx
